doc.field: Gay USA, Vol. XIV, Episode No. 24
Gay USA, Vol. XIV, Episode No. 24
COMMERCIAL: Thirteenth Annual Center Garden Party
1. Lesbian and Gay News: Andy Humm and Ann Northrop discuss recent general events that relate to the LGBT community.
COMMERCIAL: Homo Xtra, "The one. The only. The original."
COMMERCIAL: Ad Council, Earth Share, "It's a connected world."
2. Interview: Karen Burstein, Candidate for Manhattan Surrogate Court Judge, discusses her potential position.
COMMERCIAL: Ad Council, "It's what in the world you can do".
3. Interview (continued): Karen Burstein, Candidate for Manhattan Surrogate Court Judge, discusses her potential position.
COMMERCIAL: Thirteenth Annual Center Garden Party
COMMERCIAL: Homo Xtra, "The one. The only. The original."
5. Footage of Boat House Rock Five AmFAR benefit. Includes interviews with Mathilde Krim, [Founding Co-Chair of AmFAR]; Kenneth Cole, [fashion designer]; and Lypsinka, [drag artist].
COMMERCIAL: Ad Council, National Alliance for Research on Schizophrenia and Depression

7. Footage of New York Lesbian and Gay Film Festival. Includes Lou Maletta interviewing "Queen Allyson Allante", who appears in the film "Stonewall", and Rikki Beadle-Blair, screenwriter of "Stonewall".
8. Lou Maletta urges viewers to pledge money to Gay Cable Network.
